title: Kennett Square
headline:
Your best health,
here in Kennett Square
intro: If you don’t already have a Primary Care Provider, it’s important to make an appointment and find an expert you trust to guide your health and refer you to specialty care if needed.

locationsIntro.title: Kennett Square
locationsIntro.content: ChristianaCare Primary Care locations offer a variety comprehensive medical care for adults and children, with a convenient practice for our neighbors in the Kennett Square area. Many locations offer appointments by video, by phone or in-office. Call for details.

locations.title: ChristianaCare Primary Care at Kennett Square
locations.details: 721 East Baltimore Pike, Kennett Square, PA 19348
